import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import './App.css'; import baners from "./baners.png"; interface Pizza{ img: string, name: string, cm: number, dough: Dough, price: number, ingredients: string[] } enum Dough{ Lush = "пишне", Thin = "тонке", HotDog = "хот-дог" } function Main() { const [pizzas, setPizzas] = useState(); const doughOptions = Object.values(Dough).map((dough) => ( )); useEffect(() => { fetch('pizza.json') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((jsonData) => { setPizzas(jsonData); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Ошибка загрузки данных:', error); }); }, []); return(
